metadata.description: Log of unknown questions encountered by the chatbot that need admin review

reviewedQuestions.suggestedResponse: Approved response that was added to the knowledge base

adminInstructions.reviewProcess: 1. Review pending questions weekly, 2. Categorize by topic, 3. Approve/reject with notes, 4. Add approved responses to knowledge base

priorityLevels.high: Frequently asked questions or critical missing information

adminInstructions.approvalCriteria: Questions should be relevant to Constructify's platform, commonly asked, and answerable with accurate information
